sense.def:
Kar je
large
, je po velikosti ali količini večje kot navadno ali večje od povprečja.

seg.quote: She made a very large amount of money.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
at large
povemo, da govorimo o večini omenjenih oseb.

seg.quote: There has been unrest in the country at large.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je neka nevarna oseba ali žival
at large
, hočemo povedati, da je pobegnila in je še niso ujeli.

Z izrazom
by and large
povemo, da je neka trditev v veliki meri, vendar ne v celoti resnična.

seg.quote: By and large, they were free to do as they wished.
